root.title: quak damag chuquicamata mine spokesman
root.body: earthquak hit northern chile today regist 7 open end richter scale caus damag copper mine chuquicamata mine spokesman say chuquicamata public relat director guillermo barcelo told reuter telephon mine quak caus problem oper continu usual spokesman state chilean copper commiss santiago confirm damag chuquicamata
